The dwarf is an unobtainable item depicting a statue of King Alvis. It is only seen on the reward scroll of The Giant Dwarf quest, and cannot actually be obtained by players.

Prior to the removal of the trading post, players were able to search for this item.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 February 2015
(update)

The item was made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

[[File:Dwarf (The Giant Dwarf) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''dwarf''' is an [[unobtainable item]] depicting a statue of [[King Alvis]]. It is only seen on the reward scroll of [[The Giant Dwarf]] [[quest]], and cannot actually be obtained by players.

Prior to the removal of the [[trading post]], players were able to search for this item.

[[File:The_Giant_Dwarf_reward_scroll.png|left]]
